DOC.brief_summary: In randomize crossover trial , preterm infant intermittent hypoxemia need supplemental oxygen randomize either Sequence two different oxygen target range ( low : 85-89 % ; high : 91-95 % ) total duration 19 hour . Cerebral oxygenation , cardiac output , arterial oxygenation heart rate measure continuously . Primary outcome time arterial oxygen saturation < 80 % .
